bb_music_trophy.name: BB Music Trophy
bb_music_trophy.description: Brilliantly Bodacious are two words often used to describe the bearer of the BB Music Trophy. Also, "Brutally Beardy", or "Big and Bouncy". Anything celebrating the finding of all five BB Music Blocks, basically.

bubble_trophy.name: Bubble Trophy
bubble_trophy.description: This trophy is awarded for the plucky collection of all 4 bubbles.

crabpod_headphones.name: CrabPod Headphones
crabpod_headphones.description: These appear to be the kind of headphones only a crab could love. The sound quality is fabulous, but they really pinch your earlobes.

crafty_bot.name: Crafty Bot
crafty_bot.description: A robot that can make stuff for you.

trophy_cubimal.name: Cubimal Series 1 Trophy
trophy_cubimal.description: This trophy is awarded for the cubular collection of all 23 cubimals of Cubimal Series 1.

trophy_cubimal_2.name: Cubimal Series 2 Trophy
trophy_cubimal_2.description: This trophy is awarded for the cubuliscious collection of all 20 Cubimals of Cubimal Series 2.

db_music_trophy.name: DB Music Trophy
db_music_trophy.description: This plaque entitles the winner to bragging rights for collecting all five DB Music Blocks.

dg_music_trophy.name: DG Music Trophy
dg_music_trophy.description: This plaque shouts out "Look at me world! I collected all five DG Music Blocks!" Metaphorically, that is.

drink_ticket.name: Diabolical Drink Ticket
drink_ticket.description: Printed in infernal inks on fire-resistant paper, a Diabolical Drink Ticket can be given to Hell's Bartender in exchange for the potent Wine of the Dead—a fermented beverage which revitalizes the devitalized. No one knows what the Bartender does with the tickets, but rumour has it that in sufficient numbers they can be redeemed for either an all-expenses-paid vacation to Ix or the apocalypse.

dr_music_trophy.name: DR Music Trophy
dr_music_trophy.description: Let it be known that this here plaque award thingummy honors the finding and collecting of all 5 DR Music Blocks.

egg_hunter_trophy.name: Egg Hunter Trophy
egg_hunter_trophy.description: This trophy is awarded to the eager egg hunter who collects all five chocolate eggs.

emblem_trophy.name: Emblem Trophy
emblem_trophy.description: This trophy is awarded for collecting all 11 Giant Emblems. Giantdamn, you are good at Glitch!

faded_heart.name: Faded Heart
faded_heart.description: This ghostly, Faded Heart is all that remains of a forgotten tragedy.

fruit_trophy.name: Fruit Trophy
fruit_trophy.description: This cup is awarded for superior efforts in the fruit collecting sciences.

gas_trophy.name: Gas Trophy
gas_trophy.description: This trophy is awarded to those who demonstrate noble dedication to gas collecting.

gem_trophy.name: Gem Trophy
gem_trophy.description: This trophy is awarded for a nigh-unnatural love of shiny things that doesn't involve putting them in one's mouth.

greeter_twig.name: Greeter Twig
greeter_twig.description: This twig vibrates in the frequency of Greeters, the helpful humans inhabiting the world of Glitch.

hello_pumpkin.name: Hello Pumpkin!
hello_pumpkin.description: The only hollowed out vegetable so cute you'd happily put it in your pocket and carry it around all day. Or at least, you would if it didn't weigh 50lb and smell of decomposing food. Hello Pumpkin!

jack_the_pumpkin.name: Jack the Pumpkin
jack_the_pumpkin.description: Part-vegetable, part-sprite, this is Jack. He makes you feel a little autumnal, a little festive, and a little like your soul might get dragged, screaming, from your sleeping body.

jack_o_lantern.name: Jack-O-Lantern
jack_o_lantern.description: A carved pumpkin lit from the inside with the power of fireflies. You'd think this would make it look more warm and comforting. But no, still terrifying (for a vegetable).

lem_the_pumpkin.name: Lem the Pumpkin
lem_the_pumpkin.description: To mark the special relationship between the Lemmites and the Zillots, the Lem Pumpkin was created by a particularly talented Lemmite carver named Myuki. Zille, apparently, was unimpressed at this sharing of her holiday. But Lem loved it.

lem_o_lantern.name: Lem-O-Lantern
lem_o_lantern.description: An unusual addition to Zilloween, the Lem-O-Lantern, marking the special relationship between Zillots and Lemmites, has long been created for the festival by vegetablartistes. It is especially prized, as it uses a special flick of the pick known as "The Myuki Technique".

moving_box.name: Moving Box
moving_box.description: The Glitch Advanced Moving Service (GAMS) will pack up your belongings and transfer them to your new home for you.

new_player_pack_butterfly.name: New Player Pack
new_player_pack_butterfly.description: Welcome new players into the world of Ur. This pack contains a few items that should spark the imagination

new_player_pack_chicken.name: New Player Pack (Chicken)
new_player_pack_chicken.description: Welcome new players into the world of Ur. This pack contains a few items that should spark the imagination

new_player_pack_piggy.name: New Player Pack (Piggy)
new_player_pack_piggy.description: Welcome new players into the world of Ur. This pack contains a few items that should spark the imagination

note_pole.name: Note Pole
note_pole.description: I'm a little note pole which you can customize to your heart's desire and then place in your yard or your house. Post a note on me to amuse, astonish or edify your visitors.

pareidolic_cosma_toast.name: Pareidolic Giant Image on Toast
pareidolic_cosma_toast.description: A piece of toast with what some people claim is an image of Cosma. Initially bought on GleBay.

piggy_plop.name: Piggy Plop
piggy_plop.description: Piggy plop is the delicately scented excrescence of a healthy piggy. Round, brown, and mysterious, it may contain presents.

actions.description: You're an odd one, aren't ya?
Take a closer look at this plop

shiny_hello_pumpkin.name: Shiny Hello Pumpkin!
shiny_hello_pumpkin.description: A brightly-lit cute kitty pumpkin lantern. As cute as a vegetable that has been set about with a knife until it resembles an animal and then set on fire with a face full of insects can be. Pretty cute then!

spice_trophy.name: Spice Trophy
spice_trophy.description: The paws of the individual holding this award are deserving of your praise, if you consider the collection of all 16 spices praiseworthy. Which you should.

spigot.name: Spigot
spigot.description: Technically, the Spigot is like a bung, but with a tap. A tapped bung, tapered to accurately fit a Still's bunghole, this spigot is carefully calibrated to control the flow of moonshine from a fresh distilled batch. It's also, for the record, a very fun word to say. Spigot. Spigot.

steve_the_pumpkin.name: Steve the Pumpkin
steve_the_pumpkin.description: A widely-grinning pumpkin, ready to party (with the addition of fireflies). Could be accessorised with a pile of pepitas to make a puking pumpkin, but that's a matter of taste. Or lack of taste. Whatever.

steve_o_lantern.name: Steve-O-Lantern
steve_o_lantern.description: A gurning, gape-mouthed, firefly-filled glowing pumpkin, smelling of decomposing root, and overcooked vegetables. How very seasonal.

street_creator_dirt_trophy.name: Street Creator Dirt Trophy
street_creator_dirt_trophy.description: This Trophy, artfully depicting a master of dirt, marks a street-building career so great that the holder collected… well, all five parts of this trophy.

street_creator_earth_trophy.name: Street Creator Earth Trophy
street_creator_earth_trophy.description: This stunning bauble marks a remarkable amount of street-building by the holder. Enough to collect all five parts of this fine Earth Trophy, at least.

street_creator_rock_trophy.name: Street Creator Rock Trophy
street_creator_rock_trophy.description: The holder of this tchotchke has earned their reputation as a rock of the street-creation community. They also earned a patched-up trophy.

street_creator_wood_trophy.name: Street Creator Wood Trophy
street_creator_wood_trophy.description: The holder of this trophy hard-earned each of its five fragments through assiduous street-creation activity. Hopefully it won't give splinters.

xs_music_trophy.name: XS Music Trophy
xs_music_trophy.description: As shiny as the soul of its bearer, this plaque recognizes the meritorious Music Block collection skills of said bearer.

zille_the_pumpkin.name: Zille the Pumpkin
zille_the_pumpkin.description: A traditional Zilloween decoration, this is a common-or-garden pumpkin carved into a representation of Zille, giant of mountains and mining. Already pretty magical, it will become more magical with the addition of fireflies.

zille_o_lantern.name: Zille-O-Lantern
zille_o_lantern.description: A common seasonal vegetable carved into a representation of Zille, and filled with fireflies to create an eerie glow. And it IS eerie. If you squint, it's like her eyes (and the burny pumpkin smell) are following you around the room.
